title: Xin q knockup not working properly
body: Bug with Xin'Zhao right now, friend told me wasn't working  in his game (the q knockup) I spectated and it wasn't working, I tried xin in a custom and it worked sometimes but most of the time wouldn't knock up.

replies.body: This has been stated like 43 times in bug thread, but the more there are the more chance of it being noticed
send a support ticket or add to the 5.3 bugs megathread.
